pcd.data.ImageDataObject

    Package Description

    • Uses of ImageDataObject in pcd.data

      Fields in pcd.data declared as ImageDataObject 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private ImageDataObject ImageDataStorage.current
      The currently active ImageDataObject being displayed and manipulated in the main GUI window.
      Fields in pcd.data with type parameters of type ImageDataObject 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private ArrayList<ImageDataObject> ImageDataStorage.imageList
      A list of currently saved ImageDataObject
      Methods in pcd.data that return ImageDataObject 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ImageDataObject ImageDataStorage.getAndUpdateCurrentImage(int index)
      Retrieves an ImageDataObject based on index from ImageDataStorage.imageList and updates ImageDataStorage.current to it.
      ImageDataObject ImageDataStorage.getCurrent()
      Retrieves the currently active ImageDataObject.
      ImageDataObject ImageDataStorage.getImage(int index)
      Retrieves an ImageDataObject based on index from ImageDataStorage.imageList.
      ImageDataObject ImageDataObjectFactory.makeImage(String path)
      Creates new ImageDataObject from path to image
      Methods in pcd.data that return types with arguments of type ImageDataObject 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<ImageDataObject> ImageDataStorage.getImageObjectList()
      Returns the reference to the whole list of ImageDataObject.
      Methods in pcd.data with parameters of type ImageDataObject 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ImageDataStorage.addImage(ImageDataObject img)
      Adds a new ImageDataObject to ImageDataStorage.imageList
      ArrayList<AtomicInteger> ImageDataStorage.getCounts(ImageDataObject imgObj)
      The same as ImageDataStorage.getCounts() but for a specific ImageDataObject
      Method parameters in pcd.data with type arguments of type ImageDataObject 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ImageDataStorage.setImageObjectList(ArrayList<ImageDataObject> list)
      Replaces the ImageDataStorage.imageList with a new one.

    • Uses of ImageDataObject in pcd.utils

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ArrayList<ImageDataObject> FileUtils.loadProject(File file)
      Loads the project from the XML and loads it into the software, replacing the currently open project.
      Method parameters in pcd.utils with type arguments of type ImageDataObject 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void FileUtils.saveCacheAll(ArrayList<ImageDataObject> imgs, String path)
      Saves annotations for all points, consisting of coordinates and class.
      static void FileUtils.saveProject(Path savePath, List<ImageDataObject> imgObjectList)
      Saves the project file which includes image paths, all points and their data, and some metrics.
